Events Reservation
For a more non-traditional and adventurous setting, experience Miami Brewing Companyâ€™s Taproom located onsite east of the Winery. A fun and spacious venue for a more daring and unique experience unlike any other. Our Taproom is one of the biggest Taprooms in South Florida with over 10,000 sqft!
Book your event with us!

Dan Ryan
2024-11-09
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
This place was massive, it looked like it could hold a lot of people. They also had corn hole and selection of arcade games. There was also a large outdoor seating section that is not in my photos. My girlfriend and I tried 2 of the beers, they were okay.
R-CONTENT
RNM
2024-10-26
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
This place is so nice. Real old Florida vibe. Ernesto, our waiter was very relatable and honest. Reall
R-CONTENT
Robert Zeller
2024-10-20
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Quite empty by the week, funny, but good "beers" and with Nicy you have a nice girl behind the bar and a lot of fun.
R-CONTENT
Robert Zapata
2024-10-19
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Great place and atmosphere. Great people create a great placeâ€¦ good energy hereâ€¦. I hear that sat is 18 and over but Fridays for the fam is great
R-CONTENT
Guillermo Saludas
2024-10-05
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Great place. Sadly axe throwing was closed, and food is mid. But beer and ambience are gut.
R-CONTENT
